title: Why is the NA LCS finals being held in Canada instead of NA?

replies.body: Why does it only have 12 stripes?
and 35 "stars"

I refuse to be triggered.....

The only person I ship Riven with is Singed, as they both mercilessly slaughtered innocent people in Ionia.

Really?  I grandfather-granddaughter (as in make them family members instead of lovers) ship her with Sion. 

Because the idea of her being his great granddaughter makes me all warm and fuzzy.

So let me get this straight... you like to ship people with their own granddaughters....
https://media.giphy.com/media/yHUiExmU40A4U/giphy.gif
Well, if it works for competitive Pokemon breeding...
The things we let kids do...

Haha no. I probably shouldn't use the term shipping. 

I just like to connect generational dots and other weird things. 

Example: Diana I believe is Freljordian and may be related to Ashe and Sejuani because of their hair color (granted I'm going off of how the only white haired people in the freljord we've seen are those two and Diana's parents were from a barbarian tribe I believe).

https://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/21425225.jpg

Garen's Justice is an Imperial Justice, it's not true Justice.

I'm sorry, I can't hear you over the sound of people literaly worshipping Garen.

Their personalities are too different. Both enjoy violence, but Sion wouldn't have mowed down unarmed people when he was alive. He would have at least given them a weapon before he killed them.

Anon: NO!!! DON'T KILL ME!!!!!
{{champion:14}}: Are you an unarmed citizen?

{{champion:14}}: Ok, take this axe.
Anon: Oh than...

An anon as been slained.
Because "North" of "America" is Canada.

http://i.imgur.com/YBQyBsJ.gif?Noredirect
It all make sense now.

Incorrect. America is a continental mass. You are thinking of the nation called "United States of America" which comprises of a unity of 50 states to form one nation upon the landmass known as North America. The united state is not America, but only one nation in a group of three nations which inhabit half of the American landmasses. The other half being South America located to the south.

https://media.giphy.com/media/R6bDgXEXCLcIw/giphy.gif

First: That's the joke.
http://img.pandawhale.com/post-45530-simpsons-thats-the-joke-gif-Im-vEyV.gif

Second: "America" actually does refer to a nation. "The Americas" refers to the area of the western hemisphere that is also known as "The New World". It is just like how "The People's Republic of China" is shortened to "China", "The Untied States of America" is shortened to "America". 

The Americas = Area that encompasses the continents of North America and South America 
America = Shortened version of "The United States of America"

But you are from Manitoba, so the only girls you see are like 
https://media0.giphy.com/media/xT5LMz5lvyVwYGM4IE/200_s.gif

I just assumed that all women north of South Carolina were like that. Of course, the furthest north I have gone is Georgia.... I just feel like if you *can* live some place warm, why live in the snow?

Its true our summers are short, and sometimes it drops to -30 C. But it is so beautiful up here, plenty of winter sports and wonderful summers. Less crowded, friendlier, and more wild :p

Also I am already conditioned for the north and overheat easily in the hotter states. I could show you but the pics would probably get taken down :p
